definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Any student who tries to cheat while the examiner is watching is playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 在主考監考時任何學生想作弊都是冒險。

sentences.english: When the table is "open", any object ball not legally pocketed remains off the table.
sentences.chinese: 在球局開放時任何不合法入袋的目標球均不必取出。

sentences.english: The president resigned. New elections were called.
sentences.chinese: 時任總統的亞努克維奇辭職，選舉重新舉行。

sentences.english: The province textile group manager of ZhaoDaXian support.
sentences.chinese: 時任省輕紡集團總經理的趙大賢給予支持。

sentences.english: Wu Han, as deputy mayor of Beijing City then, was responsible for explaining the tasks of demolition.
sentences.chinese: 時任北京市副市長的吳晗擔起了解釋拆除工作的任務。
